name: Fantasy Adventure - Legend of the 6 warriors
name_original: Fantasy Adventure - Legend of the 6 warriors
description:
Game description

Discover the story of the 6 warriors, a tale about the rescue of Yggdrasil, the World-Tree !

This game is a mix between Platformer adventure and RPG battle-style. (But for now, we only have the platformer preview)

Select which character you want to be ! 

- Knight : Strong warrior with a lot of defense but cannot use magic.

- Archer : Strong distance warrior, deal a lot of physical damage but don't have many defense.

- Wizard : Strong sorcerer, can annihilated a lot of ennemy with one spell but has no physical damage.

And more ! (You can see the 3 others warriors by playing the game)

This game is still a prototype, We can't do a lot of things but I will improve it when I will accumulate more skills ! :)

I have done all the code and musics. For the art, the credits are in the download link.

This is where I've learnt how to code : https://www.gamecodeur.fr/

How to play ?

- Use Arrow Keys to move.

- Press Space to jump.

- Press Enter to validate your choice
